Articles.Content:
I think it would be neat to have the game treat version numbers of a craft differently (as a separate string) than the name, and suggest/pre-fill the version numbers for us.

 

So, my first craft might be the KSP-1, and the second the KSP-2... And the game/program be smart enough to increment the number from the last craft for us. So if I choose My-1, and My-2, instead, it'd realize the next one was My-3.... or if i went KSP-001, it'd know the next one was 002, and eventually it'd be KSP-011, and not KSP-0011.
